meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a director.
meanings.sent1: The directorial decisions were evident in the film's unique style.
meanings.sent2: The directorial skills of the filmmaker were praised by critics.
meanings.sent3: The directorial touch added a special flair to the movie.
meanings.sent4: Her directorial vision transformed the play into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The directorial influence could be seen in every scene of the movie.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the direction of a play, movie, or other production.
meanings.sent1: The directorial choices enhanced the overall impact of the play.
meanings.sent2: His directorial work on the film brought out the best in the actors.
meanings.sent3: The directorial approach to the script added a comedic twist.
meanings.sent4: The directorial guidance shaped the film into a compelling story.
meanings.sent5: The directorial decisions set the tone for the entire production.

meanings.definition: In the manner of a director.
meanings.sent1: She observed the actors directorially, noting their performances.
meanings.sent2: He communicated his ideas directorially, guiding the team effectively.
meanings.sent3: The cat sauntered directorially across the room, as if in charge.
meanings.sent4: The clouds moved directorially, painting a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed directorially, carving its path through the valley.
